## SLOs for Week 05

By the end of this unit, students will be able to...

1.  Implement integrity constraints (PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, CHECK).
2.  Write and execute triggers for database automation.
3.  Optimize SQL queries for improved performance.
4.  Demonstrate SQL injection and discuss prevention strategies.
5.  Assign user roles and permissions for database security.
6.  Debug and troubleshoot complex SQL queries.
